bug.description:
Where was the error being thrown? Did the tests not pick it up?
This fix is more a hack than an actual fix -- we should have a closer look. Tests did not pick it up. It happened in the corner case where has_last_chunk is False. This would fail with a shape mismatch error for the very last chunk:
pyannote-audio/pyannote/audio/core/inference.py
Lines 301 to 303 in 83eeffd
aggregated_output[
start_frame : start_frame + num_frames_per_chunk
] += output
We should create an issue to write proper unit tests for this. Originally posted by @hbredin in #503 (comment)
